items.title: 6 Reasons Berkshire Stock Has Lagged the Market—and 3 Reasons It Could Outperform Again
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway  stock has badly lagged the  since the company’s annual meeting on May 3, but there’s also reason to believe the period of underperformance is over.  Berkshire Hathaway’s Class A shares ended Friday at $727,455, up 1% on the session.  Berkshire is up just under 7% so far this year, against 7.5% for the index.
